item.text: Let every person be subject to the governing authorities. For there is no authority except by God’s appointment, and the authorities that exist have been instituted by God.

<st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> the person who <st data-num="498" class="">resists</st> such <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="436">resists</st> the <st data-num="1296" class="">ordinance</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="436" class="">resist</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">incur</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st>

(<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="758" class="">rulers</st> <st data-num="1510">cause</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5401">fear</st> for <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">conduct</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="2556">bad</st>). Do you <st data-num="2309" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>? <st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2192" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="1537 846">its</st> <st data-num="1868" class="">commendation</st>

<st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="18" class="">well-being</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">be afraid</st> <st data-num="1437">if</st> you <st data-num="4160">do</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> government<n id="1" /> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5409" class="">bear</st> the <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="1500" class="">for nothing</st>. It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="1249" class="">servant</st> to <st data-num="1558" class="">administer</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">punishment</st> on <st data-num="4238" class="">the person who does</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st>.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st> it is <st data-num="318" class="">necessary</st> to be in <st data-num="5293" class="">subjection</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> of the authorities<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> your <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> you <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5055" class="">pay</st> <st data-num="5411" class="">taxes</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3011" class="">authorities</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="4342" class="">devoted</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846 3778">governing</st>.<n id="2" />
Pay everyone what is owed: taxes to whom taxes are due, revenue to whom revenue is due, respect to whom respect is due, honor to whom honor is due.
Owe no one anything, except to love one another, for the one who loves his neighbor has fulfilled the law.
For the commandments, “Do not commit adultery, do not murder, do not steal, do not covet,” (and if there is any other commandment) are summed up in this, “Love your neighbor as yourself.”
Love does no wrong to a neighbor. Therefore love is the fulfillment of the law.
And do this because we know the time, that it is already the hour for us to awake from sleep, for our salvation is now nearer than when we became believers.

The <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> has <st data-num="4298">advanced toward dawn</st>; the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> is <st data-num="1448" class="">near</st>. <st data-num="3767">So then</st> we must <st data-num="659">lay aside</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1746">put on</st> the <st data-num="3696" class="">weapons</st> of <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>.

Let us <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2156" class="">decently</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">daytime</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> in <st data-num="2970" class="">carousing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3178" class="">drunkenness</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> in <st data-num="2845">sexual immorality</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="766" class="">sensuality</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> in <st data-num="2054" class="">discord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st>.
Instead, put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make no provision for the flesh to arouse its desires.
